about_the_game:
Take your holiday adventure to new heights with this feature-packed DLC for "Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store"! With 4 additional locations brimming with valuable information, deeper storylines, and mind-bending puzzles, this DLC offers hours of exciting new content that expands the narrative and tests your problem-solving skills. Each location holds crucial secrets, pushing you to uncover the hidden truths of Christmasshire’s residents. Along with fresh collectibles and new achievements to unlock, this DLC delivers even more replayability and fun. Get ready to unravel the mysteries behind the holiday magic, one secret at a time!

With every puzzle solved and collectible found, you’ll unlock exciting new achievements, boosting your score and rewarding your efforts. Each new location introduces surprising story twists and offers new layers of depth to the characters!

🎄 COOK A CHRISTMAS STOLLEN!

Help Ms. Strudel bake a delicious Christmas Stollen in her cozy bakery! Along the way, she’ll share valuable information about her nephew, and maybe even reveal a secret recipe! Can her family ties hold the key to unlocking more secrets of Christmasshire?

🎄 TOUR MR. GREEDY’S LIBRARY!

Step inside Mr. Greedy’s mysterious home and explore his vast library. Why does he hate Christmas so much? Search the shelves for hidden clues and solve puzzles to discover the dark secrets that turned the mayor into a cold-hearted scrooge.

🎄 INVESTIGATE THE OLD TOY STORE!

Take a closer look at the old toy store that could be part of the Toyland empire. Search for important documents, solve challenging brain-teasers, and unlock hidden items as you dig deeper into its history and its connection to your father’s business.

🎄 DISCOVER WHAT ALFIE LIKES!

Enter Alfie’s playroom at Irma’s apartment and learn more about his interests! By understanding what he loves, you’ll be able to connect with him better. Pay close attention to his drawings and toys, as they’ll give you insight into the boy!

Dive deeper into the magical world of "Christmas Fables" and uncover the hidden connections that bind Christmasshire’s characters together with this heartwarming DLC!
